<a id="class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler"></a>

# PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler

**Inherits:** [Object](class_object.md)

A class used to provide [PhysicsServer3DExtension._soft_body_update_rendering_server()](class_physicsserver3dextension.md#class_PhysicsServer3DExtension_private_method__soft_body_update_rendering_server) with a rendering handler for soft bodies.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_private_method__set_aabb"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_aabb**\ (\ aabb\: [AABB](class_aabb.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_private_method__set_aabb)

Called by the [PhysicsServer3D](class_physicsserver3d.md) to set the bounding box for the [SoftBody3D](class_softbody3d.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_private_method__set_normal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_normal**\ (\ vertex_id\: [int](class_int.md), normal\: [Vector3](class_vector3.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_private_method__set_normal)

Called by the [PhysicsServer3D](class_physicsserver3d.md) to set the normal for the [SoftBody3D](class_softbody3d.md) vertex at the index specified by `vertex_id`.

\ **Note:** The `normal` parameter used to be of type ``const void*`` prior to Godot 4.2.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_private_method__set_vertex"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_vertex**\ (\ vertex_id\: [int](class_int.md), vertex\: [Vector3](class_vector3.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_private_method__set_vertex)

Called by the [PhysicsServer3D](class_physicsserver3d.md) to set the position for the [SoftBody3D](class_softbody3d.md) vertex at the index specified by `vertex_id`.

\ **Note:** The `vertex` parameter used to be of type ``const void*`` prior to Godot 4.2.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_method_set_aabb"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_aabb**\ (\ aabb\: [AABB](class_aabb.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_method_set_aabb)

Sets the bounding box for the [SoftBody3D](class_softbody3d.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_method_set_normal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_normal**\ (\ vertex_id\: [int](class_int.md), normal\: [Vector3](class_vector3.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler_method_set_normal)

Sets the normal for the [SoftBody3D](class_softbody3d.md) vertex at the index specified by `vertex_id`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

Sets the position for the [SoftBody3D](class_softbody3d.md) vertex at the index specified by `vertex_id`.
